evidence_example.title: test0
evidence_example.small_descr: A minimal EE demo that demostrates the compilation of a project
evidence_example.long_descr:
A minimal EE demo that demostrates the compilation of a project. The compilation uses the conf.oil file to create Debug folder. Debug folder contains:
  • the makefile;
  • the obj folder that contains the object files organized in a EE-like tree;
  • the executable file (.elf);
  • other files useful for debug;
